mapper.insert: insert into ROOM(rseq, title, content, id) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(rseq), 0) + 1 FROM ROOM a),#{title },#{content },#{id })
insert into ROOM_HAVE_DATA(rhdseq, rseq, type, seq) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(rhdseq), 0) + 1 FROM ROOM_HAVE_DATA a),#{rseq },#{type },#{seq })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ROOM ORDER BY rseq DESC
SELECT rseq FROM ROOM WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY RSEQ DESC LIMIT 1
